column4: should i be able to use unetbootin to put a ubuntu .iso onto a usb hard drive (not just a thumb drive) to do an install from?
i swapped motherboards and now jackd is broken, so i'm going to try reinstalling :/
the notion of 'reinstalling' is a Windows concept.
i've spent at least 4 hours trying to get jackd working again... it always works after an initial install
